Class VerifiableEncryption

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.zrl.idmx.ve.VerifiableEncryption
Direct Known Subclasses:
VerifiableEncryptionOpening
public class VerifiableEncryption
extends java.lang.Object

Verifiable encryption of a plaintext for a given public key.

Parameters:
theU - Value u of the ciphertext.
theE - Value e of the ciphertext.
theV - Value v of the ciphertext.
theCapL - Parameter L (label) of the ciphertext.

VerifiableEncryption

public VerifiableEncryption(java.math.BigInteger m,
                            java.math.BigInteger r,
                            java.net.URI theVEPublicKeyLocation,
                            java.lang.Object theCapL)
Method to encrypt the message m under the public key pk with label L and randomness r. The method PublicKey.getRandom() generates random values in the correct interval (0...n/4).

Parameters:
m - Message.
r - Randomness.
theVEPublicKeyLocation - Location of the verifiable encryption public key.
theCapL - Label.

abs

public static java.math.BigInteger abs(java.math.BigInteger a,
                                       java.math.BigInteger n2)
Computes abs(a,n2).

Parameters:
a - Parameter to determine absolute value.
n2 - n2.
Returns:
a mod n2 if a <= n2/2, else (n2 - a) mod n2.

computeY2Y3

public static final java.math.BigInteger computeY2Y3(VEPublicKey pk,
                                                     java.math.BigInteger u,
                                                     java.math.BigInteger e,
                                                     java.math.BigInteger capL,
                                                     java.math.BigInteger r)
Computes (y2*y3^H(u,e,L))^r.

Parameters:
pk - Public key to be encrypted for.
u - Parameter u of the ciphertext.
e - Parameter e of the ciphertext.
capL - Parameter L (label) of the ciphertext.
r - Randomness.
Returns:
(y2*y3^H(u,e,L))^r.

computeHash

public static java.math.BigInteger computeHash(int l_H,
                                               java.math.BigInteger u,
                                               java.math.BigInteger e,
                                               java.math.BigInteger capL)
Computes the keyed hash function of the verifiable encryption where the key is chosen randomly from an appropriate key space associated with the security parameter.

Parameters:
l_H - Bit length of the hash.
u - First parameter to be hashed, when used in the verifiable encryption context, this is the paramter u from the encryption.
e - Second parameter to be hashed, when used in the verifiable encryption context, this is paramter e.
capL - Third parameter to be hashed, when used in the verifiable encryption context, this is the label of the encryption.

                                                  java.math.BigInteger m)
To compute y1^r * h^m mod n2.

Parameters:
pk - Public key.
r - Randomness.
m - Message.
Returns:
y1^r * h^m mod n2.
